data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
In Osaka a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 4, Corner awarded to Sapporo.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Osaka.
Ball safe as Sapporo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 6, Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Hiroaki Okuno.
Cerezo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Cerezo in their own half.
In the minute 9, Cerezo needs to be cautious. Sapporo have an attacking throw-in.
Jay Bothroyd (Sapporo) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Cerezo have a goal kick.
In the minute 11, Throw-in for Cerezo at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
Jay Bothroyd's header is off-target for Sapporo.
Goal kick for Cerezo at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
In the minute 13, Masuya Ueda signals a free kick to Cerezo in their own half.
Free kick Sapporo.
Ball goes out of play for a Cerezo goal kick.
In the minute 16, Can Cerezo capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Cerezo surge into the attack at Yanmar Stadium Nagai but Tatsuhiro Sakamotoâ€™s header is off-target.
Masuya Ueda awards Sapporo a goal kick.
In the minute 19, Free kick for Cerezo in the half of Sapporo.
Sapporo have a goal kick.
Cerezo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 22, Sapporo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Masuya Ueda awards Cerezo a goal kick.
Masuya Ueda signals a free kick to Sapporo.
In the minute 27, Masuya Ueda signals a free kick to Cerezo in their own half.
Douglas is booked for the away team.
Goal kick for Cerezo at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
In the minute 31, Masuya Ueda signals a Cerezo throw-in in Sapporo's half.
Masuya Ueda signals a free kick to Sapporo.
Can Sapporo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Cerezo's half?
In the minute 33, Free kick for Cerezo in their own half.
Jay Bothroyd's header is off-target for Sapporo.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Osaka.
In the minute 37, Throw-in for Sapporo in the half of Cerezo.
Ball goes out of play for a Cerezo goal kick.
Cerezo are coming forward and Hiroaki Okuno gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 38, Sapporo have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Sapporo close to the penalty box.
Cerezo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 41, Cerezo to take a throw-in in Sapporo territory.
Sapporo have been awarded a corner by Masuya Ueda.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 44, Can Sapporo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cerezo's half?
Sapporo have been awarded a corner by Masuya Ueda.
Masuya Ueda signals a Sapporo throw-in in Cerezo's half.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Sapporo.
In Osaka, Tomoki Takamine of Sapporo is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Throw-in for Sapporo in the half of Cerezo.
In the minute 45, The 1st half is prolonged by 2 minutes of added time.
In Osaka a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
Takanori Sugeno (Sapporo) has received a first yellow card.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Osaka.
In the minute 47, Masuya Ueda signals a throw-in for Sapporo, close to Cerezo's area.
Takuma Arano of Sapporo gets in a strike, but is off target.
Masuya Ueda awards Cerezo a goal kick.
In the minute 48, Can Cerezo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sapporo's half?
Cerezo to take a throw-in in Sapporo territory.
Masuya Ueda signals a free kick to Cerezo in their own half.
In the minute 51, Corner awarded to Sapporo.
Sapporo have been awarded a corner by Masuya Ueda.
Free kick for Cerezo in their own half.
In the minute 53, Goal kick for Cerezo at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
Cerezo's Ken Tokura misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Sapporo goal kick.
In the minute 55, Free kick Cerezo.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Cerezo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 58, Masuya Ueda signals a Cerezo throw-in in Sapporo's half.
Hiroaki Okuno scores with a header and the home team increase their lead to 2-0.
The away team have replaced Kosuke Shirai with Lucas Fernandes. This is the first substitution made today by Michael Petrovic.
In the minute 62, Free kick for Cerezo in the half of Sapporo.
Masuya Ueda signals a free kick to Cerezo.
Jay Bothroyd (Sapporo) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 63, Free kick for Sapporo in the half of Cerezo.
Cerezo have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Sapporo in their own half.
In the minute 64, Free kick for Sapporo in their own half.
Sapporo are whistled for offside.
Sapporo apply pressure and a brilliant scoring opportunity is created for Jay Bothroyd. But the ball crashes against the crossbar!
In the minute 67, Corner awarded to Sapporo.
Masuya Ueda awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick Cerezo.
In the minute 68, Masuya Ueda signals a free kick to Sapporo in their own half.
Throw-in for Sapporo in the half of Cerezo.
Sapporo have been awarded a corner by Masuya Ueda.
In the minute 72, Sapporo to take a throw-in in Cerezo territory.
Koji Suzuki is on a sub for Ken Tokura for Cerezo.
Eiichi Katayama is replacing Hiroshi Kiyotake for Cerezo at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
In the minute 73, Kazuki Fukai is replacing Takuma Arano for the away team.
Michael Petrovic (Sapporo) is making a second substitution, with Hiroki Miyazawa replacing Takuro Kaneko.
Sapporo pushes forward through Douglas, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 76, Sapporo have been awarded a corner by Masuya Ueda.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Can Sapporo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cerezo's half?
In the minute 78, Ball goes out of play for a Cerezo goal kick.
Throw-in Sapporo.
In Osaka a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 81, Masuya Ueda signals a free kick to Cerezo in their own half.
Masuya Ueda signals a free kick to Cerezo.
The home team replace Hiroaki Okuno with Jun Nishikawa.
Throw-in for Sapporo at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
In the minute 83, Cerezo make their fourth substitution with Leandro Desabato replacing Yasuki Kimoto.
Jay Bothroyd (Sapporo) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 86, Sapporo push upfield and Jay Bothroyd gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Cerezo defence.
In Osaka a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 87, Throw-in for Sapporo in the half of Cerezo.
Lucas Fernandes (Sapporo) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Cerezo's Jun Nishikawa misses with an attempt on goal.
Masuya Ueda awards Sapporo a goal kick.
Free kick Cerezo.
In the minute 89, Michael Petrovic is making the team's fourth substitution at Yanmar Stadium Nagai with Ryota Hayasaka replacing Douglas.
Sapporo advance rapidly upfield but Masuya Ueda blows for offside.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Shota Fujio of Cerezo smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Cerezo.
Shota Fujio (Cerezo) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Goal kick for Sapporo at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
Sapporo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Masuya Ueda awards the home team a throw-in.
It's 2-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
Miguel Angel Lotina is making the team's fifth substitution at Yanmar Stadium Nagai with Shota Fujio replacing Tatsuhiro Sakamoto.
